##https://lyceum-allotments.github.io/2016/06/emscripten-and-sdl-2-tutorial-part-1/

DKSET(CRYPTO ${3RDPARTY}/cryptopp600)

IF(WIN32)
	IF(NOT EXISTS "${CRYPTO}")
		DKSET(CURRENT_DIR ${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		DKDOWNLOAD(${DKONLINE}/Libs/cryptopp600.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/cryptopp600.zip ${CRYPTO})
	ENDIF()
ENDIF()
